# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.0.10] - 2026-01-09

### Added

- `log_lineage` function

### Fixed

- Allow limiting Snowflake query history lookup to last N minutes

### Added

- `log_query` function


## [0.0.8] - 2025-05-22

### Added

- Airflow 3 support
